The quest reward item is not yet available.

I plan to kick off the finale either tonight or tomorrow night. I haven't decided! Obviously, I would like for lots to be around. It does not matter where you are when this kicks off - everyone on Caligos Isle will experience it, but it may be different in one location versus another.

In addition, the item's benefit will not kick in until after Ebon Gate has ended.

~ Haliste ~ The Forest Gnome of Silverwood Manor SGM, Events

Evarin
Monday, October 30th, 2017, 11:42:03 AM

Quote from GM Haliste on Discord:

Quest item is a progressive item for the next 4 years. At its base, it is a zested item (which will also increase in verb traps); If you have the max 1000 favor, then you have access to a POINT ability which (currently) is -5DS/-3TD, 3x/day. That will increase both in strength and usage. If you are a convert (and at max favor) you also have the COVER ability which is a fear resistance boost. That will increase both in strength and usage, as well.

You can PROD the item to change the item type (bracelet, ring, anklet, and... I forget if pendant is in there or not.)

There will be an opportunity to "catch up" at EG18. (and at subsequent years)

It won't happen before EG18 though. It will always be more beneficial to do it when it's first available, rather than catching up on the back end.
